name: Meteorise
description:
Hi, I'm bloxman10009 and welcome to my new game, in this game you dodge meteors, avoid getting burned by them and trying to survive for 1 minute.

Although it sounds easy, trust me, it isn't

I hope you check out my game and enjoy, if you like it or if you have any tips please comment

*Note: Computer must be on Scale and Layout of 125%, on Display Resolution of 1920 x 1080, and on Display Orientation of Landscape
